voxy.config.title: Voxy config
voxy.config.general.ingest.tooltip: Enables or disables voxies ability to convert new chunks into LoDs
voxy.config.general.serviceThreads.toolt: Number of threads the ServiceThreadPool can use
voxy.config.general.subDivisionSize.tool: Maximum size in pixels (squared) of screenspace AABB before subdiving to smaller LoDs (Smaller being higher quality)
voxy.config.general.renderDistance.toolt: Render distance of voxy, each unit is equivalent to 32 chunks in vanilla (i.e. to get to vanilla render distance multiply by 32)
